title: conferred on them by section 11 (1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Taoiseach) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (taoiseach) order 2020

title: conferred on them by section 11 (1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of whose address
text_raw:
2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of whose address 
were deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to the Taoiseach with effect from the date opposite mention 
of the person. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [752] 3
text_norm: 2 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser taoiseach effect date opposite mention person notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 5th january 2021 752 3
